problem.markdown: Consider an ideal gas. Which of the following statements are true? [x] Its molecules occupy no volume. [ ] Its molecules do not collide with each other. [x] Its molecules do not have a force of attraction or repulsion between them. [ ] Its molecules are hard spheres which occupy a finite volume
problem.p: Consider an ideal gas. Which of the following statements are true?

checkboxgroup.choice: Its molecules do not collide with each other.
Its molecules do not have a force of attraction or repulsion between them.
Its molecules are hard spheres which occupy a finite volume
